projects.title: Our References
projects.subtitle: Discover a selection of our successfully completed projects - each one proof of our competence and passion for excellent buildings.

project1.title: Business Tower Frankfurt
project1.description: Pioneering office complex in the heart of the financial metropolis with sustainable architecture and state-of-the-art building technology.
project1.longDescription: The 20-story Business Tower Frankfurt combines state-of-the-art office technology with sustainable architecture. The building offers 15,000 m² of high-quality office space and has been certified to LEED Gold standard.

project2.title: Residence Munich Maxvorstadt
project2.description: Exclusive residential complex in Munich's most sought-after location with 120 premium residential units and first-class amenities.
project2.longDescription: This luxurious residential complex in Munich's Maxvorstadt offers 120 exclusive apartments with upscale amenities. The project includes underground parking, wellness area and 24-hour concierge service.

project3.title: LogisticHub Hamburg
project3.description: State-of-the-art logistics center with fully automated warehouse technology and sustainable energy supply on 25,000 m².
project3.longDescription: LogisticHub Hamburg sets new standards in automated warehousing. On 25,000 m², the most modern technologies are used for CO2-neutral and highly efficient logistics processes.

about.title: About GRAVON
about.paragraph1: For over 25 years, GRAVON Projektbau has stood for the highest quality, reliability and innovation in construction. As a leading general contractor, we have successfully completed over 200 demanding projects.
about.paragraph2: Our interdisciplinary team of experienced architects, engineers and project managers works closely with our clients to develop customized solutions that are both functional and aesthetically convincing.
about.paragraph3: Sustainability and innovation are at the heart of our work. We consistently rely on the latest construction technologies, environmentally friendly materials and energy-efficient solutions for future-proof buildings.
